name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enter key preference for Google Chat

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select Enter key behavior in Google Chat from posting and linebreak. Posting key can be selected from Ctrl/Shift/Alt/Win/Cmd + Enter

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to choose whether to send or break your message when you press the Enter key in Google Chat. You can use the same preferences as other messaging applications to improve communication efficiency.

[!IMPORTANT] 
If you like this extension, please give it a 5-star review. It will motivate me to develop improvements :P
